name: @budi/mobile-ios
description: Budi iOS App - AI Audio Mastering

scripts.dev: open Budi.xcodeproj || echo 'Open Budi.xcodeproj in Xcode'
scripts.build: node -e "console.log('iOS builds require macOS with Xcode')"
scripts.build:simulator: xcodebuild -project Budi.xcodeproj -scheme Budi -configuration Debug -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('iOS tests require macOS with Xcode')"
scripts.lint: swiftlint lint Budi || node -e "console.log('Install swiftlint: brew install swiftlint')"
